full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### VXRAIL Maintenance and Support

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023634:T  
**Solicitation Number:** BPM019429/23634  

**Publication Date:** 25 August 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** 12 September 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT  
**Amendment Date:** None  
**Expected Contract Start Date:** None  
**Expected Contract End Date:** None  

**Tender Status:** Expired  

### Description of the Requirement

Shared Services Canada is seeking the provision of VXRAIL Maintenance and Support services. The bid is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Security Requirements

Security screening for vendors and personnel is not required.

### Proposal Guidelines

The final closing date for submission of proposals is 12 September 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT. Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to: tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

### Procurement Details

The VXRAIL Maintenance and Support services are required to be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Ontario (except NCR).

### Contact Information

For any bid inquiries or proposals, please contact:
Eric Lavigne  
Email: eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca  
Phone: 343-541-8756  
Fax: 613-960-6026  
Address: 180 Kent, Ottawa, K1J 4A8, Canada  

### Invitation to Bid

A link to the P2P portal to access the BPM solicitation is provided below:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public  
Under Solicitation List: BPM019429 SSC VXRAIL Maintenance and Support - Amendment 000
